definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
(of a contagious disease etc) to spread/to propagate/(of a style of clothing, song etc) popular/fashionable
main stream (of a river)/fig. the essential point/main viewpoint of a matter/mainstream (culture etc)
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
course/stream/sequence of processes/work flow in manufacturing
(of soil etc) to wash away/to be eroded/(fig.) (of talented staff, followers of a religious faith, investment funds etc) to go elsewhere/to fail to be retained

sentences.english: Flow regime is an important character of three phase cocurrent flow.
sentences.chinese: 三相併流的流型與系統的動態特徵有關。

sentences.english: Phoenix beauty a pushed away flow rock.
sentences.chinese: 鳳人美一把推開了流巖。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a device and a method for real-time stream file storage.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種實時流文件存儲裝置及其方法。

sentences.english: I have a problem with the fact that they just make really third-rate products.
sentences.chinese: 我持異議的是他們真的只做第三流的產品。

sentences.english: Creates a new input stream with the specified decompressor and buffer size.
sentences.chinese: 用指定的解壓器和緩衝區大小創建一個新的輸入流。

sentences.english: Leverage symmetry of message flow, where appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 在合適的地方利用消息流的對稱性。

sentences.english: You define the flows through handlers.
sentences.chinese: 您通過處理程序定義流。

sentences.english: Since this is a flow diagram it will have a separate thread.
sentences.chinese: 由於這是一個流關係圖，所以它有獨立的線程。

sentences.english: Use those user flows in your testing and design.
sentences.chinese: 在您的測試和設計中使用那些用戶流。

sentences.english: Use the stream strategy to support the granularity of distribution being undertaken.
sentences.chinese: 使用流策略支持發佈的顆粒度。

sentences.english: Iago . I bleed, sir; but not kill'd.
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古我不過流了點兒血，還沒有給他殺死。

sentences.english: Hence the team's activities are not well described by transactional workflows.
sentences.chinese: 因此，團隊的活動不好由事務工作流描述。

sentences.english: I heard him asking, tears streaming down on clang.
sentences.chinese: 我一聽他這麼問，眼淚嘩的一下就流了下來。

sentences.english: Message flows should be stateless engines in the mediation activities.
sentences.chinese: 消息流應該是中介活動中的無狀態引擎。

sentences.english: The pumice flow deposit begins from its bottom, and gradually develops forward.
sentences.chinese: 堆積過程是從浮巖流底部漸進式向前堆積。

sentences.english: A numerical study is reported on the flow over a backward-facing step.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究單邊放大臺階流的數值解。

definition: to overflow/transverse flow/to flow over/cross flow
to overflow/(literary) excessive/old variant of 鎰|镒[yi4]
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
to let drip/to trickle down/to shed (tears)
